name: vapid-web-push
title: VAPID Web Push
description: Send Web Push Notifications using VAPID keys to a given subscription.
author: iksnerd

commands.name: send-notification
commands.title: Send Push Notification
commands.description: Send a push notification to the subscription.

commands.name: setup
commands.title: Setup
commands.subtitle: VAPID keys & subscription.
commands.description: To use the Web Push API, you need to generate VAPID keys. You also need to subscribe to push notifications and get a subscription object.

commands.name: generate-vapid-keys
commands.title: Generate VAPID Keys
commands.subtitle: VAPID
commands.description: Generate VAPID keys for Web Push Notifications.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
